C

Card - Class in <Unnamed>
The Card class represents a Card in the GUI.
Card(String, ImageIcon, int) - Constructor for class Card
 
chooseDiscard(Card) - Method in class Player
Chooses what Card to discard, either the extra Card or a Card in the Rack.
choosePile(Card) - Method in class Player
Decides what Deck to pick up from based on the Card that is on top.
currentScore - Variable in class Player
Score that the Player has in their hand

E

ExtraCard - Variable in class Player
Card that is picked up, but not in the Rack

G

getCard(Card, int) - Method in class Player
Player recieves a Card to add to their Rack
getCurrentScore() - Method in class Player
Gets the running score of the Player
getExtraCard() - Method in class Player
Gets the Card that isn't in the Rack, but isn't discarded yet

Gets the name of the Player
getOwner() - Method in class Card
Gets the owner of the Card
getRack() - Method in class Player

Gets the score of the Player
getState() - Method in class Card

Hand - Variable in class Player

N

P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class Card
If the state is true, the button will be white and display the value of the Card.
pickupCard(Card) - Method in class Player
Adds the Card as an extra Card, until the Player decides to discard it or add it to their Rack
Player - Class in <Unnamed>
Player is an abstract class and is designed to be used in the game Racko.
Player(String) - Constructor for class Player
 
printHand() - Method in class Player
Prints the contents of the Player's Rack to the command line
printRack() - Method in class Player
Prints the contents of the Rack to the command line

T
